Kuwait (kw)¶

Forms¶

Kuwait-specific Form helpers

class localflavor.kw.forms.KWCivilIDNumberField(required=True, widget=None, label=None, initial=None, help_text=u'', error_messages=None, show_hidden_initial=False, validators=[], localize=False, disabled=False, label_suffix=None)[source]¶

Kuwaiti Civil ID numbers are 12 digits, second to seventh digits represents the person’s birthdate.

Checks the following rules to determine the validty of the number:
  • The number consist of 12 digits.
  • The birthdate of the person is a valid date.
  • The calculated checksum equals to the last digit of the Civil ID.
